name: Sonic Robo Blast
summary:
Sonic Robo Blast is an early Sonic fan game from 1998, created by Sonikku, real name Johnny Wallbank, of Sonic Team Junior. It is one of the earliest Sonic fangames to exist and led to the founding of Sonic Team Junior as well as the eventual creation of it's sequel, Sonic Robo Blast 2.

Since then, there been a full-out update to SRB1 started, which is approved by Sonikku, labeled as version 1.4. It is presently being worked on by Earless Team. Version 1.4 remakes the game from the ground up with the same general level ideas and premise, and is also the first truly major update to the game in years.
